products.message: All prices subject to change. Prices can not be matched. These sample guitars are not reflective of all guitars in stock at our store.

product.description: Fender's headlining guitar for decades - American made.
From the band Dream Theater, this is John Petrucci's signature guitar.
Using their signature Wizard 3 neck, and EMG pickups, Ibanez makes a shred-worthy guitar.
A classic design for a modern era, Gibon's Les Paul style is sure to please.
Classic Taylor sound in an affordable box, this acoustic will make everyone fall in love with it.
An iconic, sharp, design built for shredding, this Jackson will squeal.

product.manufacturer: Our guitar repair prices will vary depending on the service needed.
product.description: Whether its changing some pickups, or replacing a part, we can do it all. Just give us a call or bring it in!
